attributes.action: Increase Car related taxes and provide a 24 hour public transport system for all.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For those who own cars, they are at a competitve advantage when it comes to securing employment, and in terms of their quality of life, due to the poor transport links in some areas, other than London, which it is clear is offered a disproportunate amount of support in terms of public transport, with 24 hour sevices operating in most areas.

To pay for it, substantially increase car tax etc. and put the money into a transport system for all.
